Info from Lastfm:

Fabio Frizzi (born July 2, 1951) is an Italian composer, best know for his film scores he produced for the films of legendary Italian horror director Lucio Fulci.  His soundtrack work, featured in films such as Zombi 2 (also known as Zombie Flesh Eaters), City of the Living Dead and The Beyond, is minimalistic and highly atmospheric, featuring heavy use of synthesizers and slow, repetitive rhythms.
